alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 3:59AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT IBERIA...NORTHWESTERN ST. MARY AND CENTRAL ST. MARTIN PARISHES THROUGH 430 AM CST... At 358 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Fausse Pointe, or near Jeanerette, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Jeanerette, Avery Island, Loreauville, Coteau, Lydia, Lake Fausse Pointe, and Acadiana Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Iberia; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary
